name: Eye Am Watching
description:
Eye Am Watching

it started with a simple trip to the milk store. but it ended with all eyes on you. Find your way out of this nightmare by getting launched in the air, avoid falling platforms and jump on top of eyes? 

The game containes 8 levels and a boss fight at the end. can you make it? Or will you die with the end just out of Sight. 

It takes atleast 7 minutes to beat this game, but this may vary depending on your skill

This is my first game Jam/ game overall, I hope you enjoy.
I advise downloading the game and playing it that way, but the Web version works to

This game is my entry for the Brackeys GameJam 2022.2
Theme: You are Not Alone

--=-==HOW TO PLAY==-=--

WASD / Arrow keys for movement
Space / W for Jumping
Space / Left mouse Button for skipping dialogue
F to turn Flashlight On and Off
